post.title: Overheard at MIX
post.content:
“We would be happy if Firefox included WPF/e in their distro” and “There will be a version of WPF/e for Linux”

- Michael Wallent, Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF): The Opportunity for WPF Applications in the Browser and Beyond session
post.excerpt: “We would be happy if Firefox included WPF/e in their distro” and “There will be a version of WPF/e for Linux” – Michael Wallent, Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF): The Opportunity for WPF Applications in the Browser and Beyond session
